description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability identified as CVE-2024-21359 related to the Microsoft WDAC OLE DB provider for SQL Server:

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB updates specific to your Windows version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure to restart your machine after the installation to enforce the changes.

**Details**:
- For Windows 10 Version 22H2, install KB5034763 from: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763.
- For Windows 11 Version 22H2, install KB5034765 from: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765.
- Confirm that your system build matches one of the following: 10.0.22631.3155, 10.0.22621.3155, 10.0.22000.2777, 10.0.10240.20469, to ensure compatibility.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that you have administrative privileges during the update process.
- Back up your critical data before proceeding with the updates.
